name:
Professor Layton vs.
Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney
formal_name:
Professor Layton™ vs.
Phoenix Wright™: Ace Attorney™
description:
The puzzle professor and the ace
attorney unite in Professor Layton vs.
Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney, only on
Nintendo 3DS! Solve puzzles to
investigate as Professor Layton,
present evidence to the judge as
Phoenix Wright, and crack the
ultimate case!
